languages.text: "Истинно верующие найдут общий язык — если не на словах, то в общем желании очистить этот мир от скверны!"
"True believers will find common ground — if not in words, then in a shared desire to cleanse this world of corruption!"
languages.original_text: "Истинно верующие найдут общий язык — если не на словах, то в общем желании очистить этот мир от скверны!"

traits.locale_text: "True believers will find common ground — if not in words, then in a shared desire to cleanse this world of corruption!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "True believers will find common ground — if not in words, then in a shared desire to cleanse this world of corruption!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "True believers will find common ground — if not in words, then in a shared desire to cleanse this world of corruption!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "True believers will find common ground — if not in words, then in a shared desire to cleanse this world of corruption!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “真正的信徒会在彼此之间找到共同点。即使他们的言语不同，也能在‘净化这个世界的一切腐化’这一点达成共识！”
languages.original_text: "True believers will find common ground — if not in words, then in a shared desire to cleanse this world of corruption!"

traits.locale_text: “真正的信徒会在彼此之间找到共同点。即使他们的言语不同，也能在‘净化这个世界的一切腐化’这一点达成共识！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « À défaut de s'entendre sur tout le reste, les véritables croyants peuvent se rassembler autour du désir commun de purger ce monde de la corruption ! »
languages.original_text: "True believers will find common ground — if not in words, then in a shared desire to cleanse this world of corruption!"

traits.locale_text: « À défaut de s'entendre sur tout le reste, les véritables croyants peuvent se rassembler autour du désir commun de purger ce monde de la corruption ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Wahre Gläubige werden einen gemeinsamen Nenner finden — wenn nicht in Worten, dann in dem geteilten Wunsch, diese Welt von der Korruption zu säubern!"
languages.original_text: "True believers will find common ground — if not in words, then in a shared desire to cleanse this world of corruption!"

traits.locale_text: "Wahre Gläubige werden einen gemeinsamen Nenner finden — wenn nicht in Worten, dann in dem geteilten Wunsch, diese Welt von der Korruption zu säubern!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「真の信仰者は同じ地平にたどりつく…言葉で言い表せなくとも、この腐敗に満ちた世界を浄化するという願望を共有しているのだ！」
languages.original_text: "True believers will find common ground — if not in words, then in a shared desire to cleanse this world of corruption!"

traits.locale_text: 「真の信仰者は同じ地平にたどりつく…言葉で言い表せなくとも、この腐敗に満ちた世界を浄化するという願望を共有しているのだ！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Los verdaderos creyentes encontrarán una perspectiva común. Si no en las palabras, ¡en el deseo de purgar la corrupción de este mundo!».
languages.original_text: "True believers will find common ground — if not in words, then in a shared desire to cleanse this world of corruption!"

traits.locale_text: «Los verdaderos creyentes encontrarán una perspectiva común. Si no en las palabras, ¡en el deseo de purgar la corrupción de este mundo!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Gerçek inançlılar illa ortak noktada buluşur... Sözde olmasa bile dünyamızı yozluktan muhafaza etmeye yönelik ortak arzumuzda!"
languages.original_text: "True believers will find common ground — if not in words, then in a shared desire to cleanse this world of corruption!"
